_meta.description: Bundled lexeme dictionaries for Jargoyle drift operations
_meta.format: Each key is a dictionary name. Each dictionary maps a word to an array of replacement candidates.

_meta.description: Color terms mapped to adjacent/related colors

modes.literal: First entry in each array is the canonical swap (used for deterministic mapping)
modes.drift: Random selection from the entire array (adjacent colors in the palette)

_meta.description: General synonym substitutions for common words

boil the ocean: bite off more than you can chew
